none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-07-just-short-of-living/extracted/Just Short Of Living/01 Blue Skies Ahead
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-07-just-short-of-living/extracted/Just Short Of Living/03 To This Day

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 31, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Perfect old school youth crew from Texas. The riffs, the backing gang vocals, the breakdowns....if this is your shit then you couldn't really ask for much more.  JUST SHORT OF LIVING Note: This demo is meant to have six songs, but my B-side is blank. You get what I get, punks...
